message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. I believe this is fair considering the potential risk of inflation.
I think a 60/40 split is a fair starting point. Let's see if we can do better than Alice's initial offer.
Considering the inflation impact, I propose an equal division of the $10,000. This ensures both of us receive a fair share without risking one side being disadvantaged.
